Title: Mock Two Piece Evening Dress with Beaded Trim

----

Sku: 70402

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 6, 8, 4, 10, 12

Colors: navy

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: 70402-navy-mock-two-piece-evening-dress-with-beaded-trim_p.jpg

----

Description: This dress is perfect for the woman who wants to show off her sexy side. It is a mock two piece with a sheer split through the middle creating the illusion of an open bust line that extends to the waistline and the back. The beaded trim surrounds the neckline and makes a diagonal across the waistline of the open back. A floor length train with a high split in the front completes the look.
